description: This Java source file defines the class `DoubleIPC`, which implements the `ObjectIPC` interface. It provides methods for serializing and deserializing a double value to and from JSON format, acting as an IPC (Inter-Process Communication) object specific to double data types.

classes.name: DoubleIPC
classes.description: An IPC object for handling Double (double primitive) values, capable of JSON serialization and deserialization.

methods.name: DoubleIPC
methods.description: Default constructor for creating an instance with no initial value.

methods.name: DoubleIPC
methods.description: Constructor for creating an instance with an initial double value.

methods.name: getValue
methods.description: Returns the current double value stored in this object.

methods.name: setValue
methods.description: Sets the double value stored in this object.

methods.name: toJSON
methods.description: Serializes the DoubleIPC object to a JSON object.

methods.name: fromJSON
methods.description: Deserializes the JSON object to populate the DoubleIPC object.
